document.full_text: in a gloomy room in his parents' home, heavy with the smell of medicine, iraqi police officer jaafar ali lies motionless, his body paralyzed by a bullet to the head fired by an al qaeda militant.
document.title: despite the danger, iraqis line up to join police
lines_and_colors: in a gloomy room in his parents' home, heavy with the smell of medicine, iraqi police officer jaafar ali lies motionless, his body paralyzed by a bullet to the head fired by an al qaeda militant.
